author: Mozilla Labs
description: Track tracking sites and automatically block them.
name: about-trackers

preferences.description: Grant these domains normal connection access and cookies. Comma separated list of domains.
preferences.name: knownNotTrackers
preferences.title: Known not-trackers

preferences.description: Block tracking cookies for these embedded domains but allow connection access. Comma separated list of domains.
preferences.name: potentialTrackers
preferences.title: Potentially-tracking embeds
